short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows having a Waze link to open in IOS or Android app automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your Google Maps experience with the Waze Navigation Extension! Seamlessly generate Waze links for your desired locations and elevate your navigation to a whole new level. Whether you're planning a road trip or navigating through the city, this extension empowers you to effortlessly copy Waze URLs and open them directly in the Waze app on your iOS or Android device.

Key Features:

üåê Generate Waze links with a single click.
üöó Plan your routes on Google Maps and switch to Waze effortlessly.
üìç Ideal for quick navigation on both iOS and Android.
How to Use:

Open Google Maps and locate your destination.
Click the Waze Navigation Extension icon.
Copy the generated Waze link and paste it into your Waze app.
Enjoy seamless navigation with Waze's advanced features.
Upgrade your travel experience with the Waze Navigation Extension now!

Feel free to customize this description according to the specific features and functionalities of your extension. Highlighting the convenience and simplicity of your extension can attract users looking for an easy way to transition between Google Maps and Waze.
